description: A playful take on garden fences being literally 'overlooked'.
title: Fence Tale
n_1: Tom and Jerry stand by a garden fence, admiring the view.
n_2: They notice the fence's height, obstructing the garden view.
n_3: They decide to peek over the fence, curious about the hidden view.
n_4: Finally, they realize the fence's purpose and its frequent oversight.
